page.title: 12RECREATION SCRAMBLING SPORTS
page.content: My hobby is{scrambling.}Sometimes we go to Corfe Mullen on Charlie Weldon's farm. My brother still rides but we sold my bike some time ago. Many of my family go in for trials (riding over an obstacle course and being timed) and scrambling (racing round a track). We help set up the track before the race. The bikes have to be checked to see which classes they should be in. There are three groups of riders - senior, junior, and children under 9. My brother and I are in the junior group. My Dad has won many trials' trophies. In our school we are very lucky to have two large{gyms}and we have a large field of about 6 hectares. For {games}lessons we wear a special kit - shorts, T-shirt, socks and trainers. We have a sports day when we compete to find the best child in each sport.
